entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Port-Menier
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:43 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Menier 9:00 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023
Temperature: -8.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -12.2°C
Wind: NNE 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow or freezing rain. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning in the morning then changing to freezing rain in the afternoon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Freezing rain or rain. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain near midnight. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Showers. High plus 3. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023
